placeholderImages.description: A vibrant collage of Indian heritage crafts including colorful textiles, intricate pottery, traditional jewelry, and handwoven fabrics showcasing the rich cultural diversity of India.
placeholderImages.imageHint: indian heritage crafts colorful textiles pottery jewelry handwoven fabrics cultural diversity
